description: A wizard stands before a large, contorted frog wearing a crown, suggesting a magical transformation has gone wrong. The frog's awkward posture implies it is malfunctioning or stuck in an intermediate state. The wizard's comment treats the fantastical transformation as a mundane mechanical problem requiring repair, creating an absurd contrast between magic and technology. This highlights the irony of applying a modern, technical solution like a 'tune-up' to a fairy tale scenario. The surreal image combines fantasy elements with the banality of vehicle maintenance, emphasizing the absurdity of the situation.
caption: “Gad … I gotta get this thing in for a tune-up.”
